page.title: 10BUILDINGS IN H.GREEN AREA.
page.content: There are several old houses in Holmer Green.One is a flint and brick cottage in Watchet Lane which used to be a toll house.Pear Tree Cottage was an old work house.In Hazlemere the only important building is an insurance building called Equity and Law.In Holmer Green a 4 bedroomed detached house with a 90 foot garden,is priced at 81,250 pounds. It was built in 1974 and has full gas central heating and cavity insulation. It has a 14 foot kitchen.A 19 foot 10 inch lounge and separate dining room, with 4 bedrooms and bathroom upstairs. A large terraced house in the same area is priced at 48,950 pounds.It has gas central heating,large lounge/diner and kichen.Upstairs it has 3 bedrooms and a bathroom.There is a single garage and a secluded walled garden.
